on reading compounds: 危【キ】danger, Chinese "rooftop" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
kun reading compounds: 危ない【あぶない】dangerous, risky, hazardous, perilous, precarious, in danger, in jeopardy, critical, grave, at risk, uncertain, unreliable, insecure, unsteady, doubtful, close (i.e. a close call), narrow
危ない橋を渡る【あぶないはしをわたる】to tread on thin ice, to go out on a limb, to walk a tightrope, to take risks, to cross a dangerous bridge
危うい【あやうい】dangerous, risky, hazardous, perilous, precarious, in danger, in jeopardy, critical, grave, at risk, uncertain, unreliable, insecure, unsteady, doubtful, close (i.e. a close call), narrow
危ぶむ【あやぶむ】to fear, to doubt, to have misgivings about, to worry about, to be anxious about, to be apprehensive about
